name: Extreme Multi Level Parking: The real Driving Test
name_original: Extreme Multi Level Parking: The real Driving Test
description:
Hang on! You are getting late in the busy city traffic and need to rush through the busy hours to park your sports car in the multi-level car parking area. Teat your thrilling parking skills in Extreme Multi Level Parking: The real Driving Test simulation and racing game. This is an ultimate test of your traffic driving and valet parking skills where there are sharp corners and limited parking space to play with.
You may have pass your traffic driving test but this Extreme Multi Level Parking: The real Driving Test game will challenge your driving skills and sense to the extreme level that it is not easy to get through the multi-story parking building area and pass the exam. You need to find and reached the check points in step by step way but keep in mind that the clock is also ticking to reach your destination safe and sound. Also you need to beat the best time and score to become the winner and advance to next level. Every hit and scratch to the car also cost you the score and time. You have to reach the designated parking area within time and without any scratch to your super sport car. There are multiple addictive but challenging levels with several support cars at your garage to select.
So download this supreme deluxe parking challenge game Extreme Multi Level Parking: The real Driving Test and trained to be the ultimate and undisputed sports car transporter and parking driver. You have the traffic license to drive in extreme traffic conditions? Thinks again!

Game Features:
1) Smooth and Easy Game Controls
2) Addictive and exciting parking levels
3) Advance sports cars to drive
4) Excellent 3D Graphics and Environment
